Package PresentationLayer

The PresentationLayer package most importantly contains the FrontController servlet and the Command class. Every other class works in tandem with Command, which in turn works with the FrontController. All classes in this package have to do with functions and actions related to our jsp pages. Without them, the individual jsp pages don't do anything.

    RemoveCupcake  
    UnknownCommand
    The purpose of UnknownCommand is to report if the string provided with the execute method from Command doesn't match with any of the strings added in the HashMap in Command's initCommands method.
